short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An in-browser debugging tool, providing insights on Coveo implementations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explorer helps validate the health of Coveo analytics implementations sending Event Protocol events via Relay. The extension shows emitted events in real-time, and whether they are valid or contain errors.
